product_desc:
Kraver is a “lunch-o’clock” app.  A discovery tool and a  (MOP) mobile order and payment platform.

Once upon a time we had to google and google and google what we wanted for lunch “best restaurant nearby, fast, healthy, clean, paleo, comfort etc.” We are here make sure those days are a relic from the past. We’ve built a new way to find exactly what you want to eat, right now.   With just a few taps we know each other well and get infinitely smarter over time.

To understand just how we do this, you need to know about our menu discovery project. Our meal analysts have tagged individual meals with hundreds of identifiers to help find the perfect food at the perfect time: establishments around the nation and how to find it.
name: Kraver
